detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract REVO (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#60-79) has payable functions:
	 - REVO.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#73-75)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0

detectors.description:
ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#32-38) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#33)
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#34)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#35)

detectors.description:
ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#40-47) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool)(balances[_from] >= _amount && allowed[_from][msg.sender] >= _amount && _amount > 0 && balances[_to] + _amount > balances[_to]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#41)
	- balances[_from] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#42)
	- allowed[_from][msg.sender] -= _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#43)
	- balances[_to] += _amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/REVO.sol#44)
